name: Anti-Antivirus
description:
Muahaha! You are a virus who has infiltrated a computer with only one goal in mind, make it EXPLODE!!!  Defeat all those dumb antiviruses, destroy the processors and claim your victory!
Bonus challenge: can you win the game with only using the default melee weapon? 
Bonus bonus challenge: ...or maybe you can win it without killing anyone?

Controls:

  • Left mouse button: attack
  • Right mouse button: drop/pick up weapon
  • WASD to move

Credits

  • Jarppi : Programming
  •  Spazi : Programming & helping with everything
  •  Allylix :  Virus and gun design, animation & logo
  • Renkku : Antivirus and level design, animation & UI
  • Hurlumei : Music and sound effects
